title: Simulation-Based Peer-Assisted Radiography Education Program

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic radiation physics and imaging equipment terminology
context.additional_context: Safe practical training environment using educational simulators and digital devices (tablets/VR headsets) instead of actual radiation equipment

learning_goals: Learners can perform equipment setup according to radiographic imaging protocols in a simulation environment with 80% accuracy.
Learners can produce diagnostic-quality images three times consecutively by adjusting shooting angles based on peer feedback.
Learners can analyze imaging error cases in PBL team projects and propose two or more improvement strategies.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
